title: Amazon KDP Step by Step Low Content Book Niche Research Tutorial for Q3 July 2023

tactics.name: target niche variations
tactics.description: Identify underserved sub-niches by adding demographic or interest-based modifiers to broad search terms
steps: Check Amazon search results for broad terms
Look for sponsored products and customer reviews
Use stock image sites for cover design
source_quotes: If you want to take part in this competition... the only ways are spending money for ads

tactics.name: patriotic holiday niches
tactics.description: Leverage 4th of July celebrations by creating low-content books with patriotic themes and relevant keywords.
steps: Check Amazon search results for keyword variations
Design covers with flag motifs and patriotic colors
caveats: Search term demand may be seasonal
source_quotes: According to a survey conducted in 2022, 84% of American respondents stated they were planning to celebrate the 4th of July.

tactics.name: seasonal event targeting
tactics.description: Create low-content books around July holidays like World Chocolate Day and National Ice Cream Day.
steps: Map July holidays to relevant niches (e.g., chocolate lovers, ice cream enthusiasts)
Analyze Google Trends for search volume patterns
caveats: Lower traffic compared to major holidays
source_quotes: World Chocolate Day on July 7th, National Ice Cream Day on July 16th...
